title: Bar Loukanikos
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in Lavapies district, offers some vegan choices such as croquetas, a variety of in-house-made burgers and tostas. Veer, a vegan artisan beer, is available. Fun atmosphere, especially on the weekends, when, at times a DJ plays classic ska records. The bar is located close to a popular area occupied by the Spanish counter-culturists and has become a meeting point for everyone interested in politics and the arts.
